titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Paules Crosse by R. Lewes, Baccheler of Divinitie, concerning Isaac his testament, disposed by the Lord to Iacobs comfort, though it were intednded to Esau by his father; shewing, that the counsel of God shal stand, albeit the whole worlde withstande it.
titleStmt.author: Lewes, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, printer to that famous Vniversitie,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Isaac his testament.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
